description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a, line 3. Physical description: 13 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; extensive interlinear and marginal notes. Damp-stained, ragged and some repairs. Origin: Shaʻbān 1138 H [April 1726] (leaf 134a). Incipit: الحمد لله المتفرد بالقدم والدوام المتنزه عن مشابهة الاعراض والاجسام
author: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325
extent: 134 leaves : paper ; 248 x 150 (156 x 72) mm bound to 248 x 154 mm
title: Irshād al-adhhān ilá aḥkām al-īmān.
uniform_title: ارشاد الاذهان الى احكام الايمان. جلد 1
creator: ابن المطهر الحلي، الحسن بن يوسف، 1250-1325
subject: Islamic law—Interpretation and construction—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
